name: Watercress, Radish And Cream-Cheese Sandwiches
keywords: appetizer, cream cheese, radish, watercress, fall
recipeIngredient: 6 sprigs watercress (leaves and tender stems only)

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and cut the radishes into wafer-thin slices. Spread the cream cheese on the slices of bread. Press 3 sprigs of watercress into the cream cheese on each slice of bread. Top each with a few slices of radish and salt lightly. Serve open-faced.
